name: mcp-server-circleci
description: Enable AI Agents to fix build failures from CircleCI.

rating.reason: The toolset shows adequate documentation quality with clear tool names and basic functionality descriptions. However, the descriptions are excessively verbose with redundant warnings and instructions that would be better handled by the system rather than documentation. Parameter descriptions are generally clear but inconsistent in detail. While the tools are broadly functional, the documentation could be significantly more concise and focused on essential usage information.
